resources.string: You must login to book topic
Please, update app to new version to continue.
What is the check-in procedure like?
We will scan the QR code that has been sent earlier to attendees. Please kindly prepare a mobile device in advance for a quicker and handier check-in process.
What is the main language at the event?

Keynote and a number of sessions of the event will be presented to audience entirely in English by foreign connoisseurs. Other sessions will be presented to audience in Vietnamese by domestic technology experts.
If I make an individual question to the speaker, how will I receive the answer?

At the end of every session, speakers will spend 5 â€“ 10 minutes for answering any enquiry of the audience. Should you have a question that has not been raised during this Q&A interval, you can write it down in a note and attach your email and hand it to one of our supporters presented in the room. They will then give your question directly to the speaker.
This topic will be deleted from My I/O
